DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from Array Networks Secure Access Gateways.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Authorized Access"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="clientapp: backend closed connection to port \d+"

FastPattern.description: 3, ApplicationTrafficAudit: clientapp closing/opened connection to backend on port
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="clientapp: (?:closing|opened new) connection to backend on port \d+"

FastPattern.description: 4, ApplicationTrafficAudit: clientapp opened new connection to backend
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) id=\w+ time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=([-\w.]+) pri=(\d+) (.+) msg="clientapp: opened a new connection to backend ([\d:.]+)\." *$
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="clientapp: opened a new connection to backend [\d:.]+\."

FastField.defaultValue: clientapp: opened a new connection to backend "$6"

FastFormatter.format: clientapp: opened a new connection to backend "$6" for user "$8"

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="clientapp: (?:initiated a new|terminated a) control connection"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Connector Thin Client Started"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="DesktopDirect Client Started
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="(?:Disconnected from|Starting a) remote desktop (?:on)?\s*[-\w.]+"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Failed to access, session \(id=[A-F\d]+\) not found\."
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Invalid request\.?"

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) ip conflict: ([a-f\d:]+) is using VPN IP address ([\d.]+).*
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ ip conflict: [a-f\d:]+ is using VPN IP address [\d.]+

FastField.defaultValue: IP conflict: "$3" is using VPN IP address "$4"

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="CLI cmd ".+" (?:success|fail) code -?\d+"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="ICMP session (?:start|timeout)"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="User logout, terminate ICMP session"

FastPattern.description: 16, PointToPointTrafficAudit: vpn established a new tunnel
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="vpn: established a new tunnel"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="vpn: got unknown ATP control packet, cmd=\d+"

FastPattern.description: 18, PointToPointTrafficAudit: vpn internal IP address released
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="vpn: internal IP address [\d.]+ released"

FastFormatter.format: vpn: internal IP address "$9" released by user "$8"

FastPattern.description: 19, PointToPointTrafficAudit: vpn previous used IP assigned
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="vpn: previous used IP for this session [\d.]+ assigned"

FastFormatter.condition: .*\buser=(\S+).*,vpn: previous used IP for this session ([\d.]+) assigned
FastFormatter.format: vpn: previous used IP for this session "$9" assigned for user "$8"

FastPattern.description: 20, PointToPointTrafficAudit: vpn this is a new session
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="vpn: this is a new session, dynamic IP address [\d.]+ assigned"

FastFormatter.condition: .*\buser=(\S+).*,vpn: this is a new session, dynamic IP address ([\d.]+) assigned
FastFormatter.format: vpn: this is a new session, dynamic IP address, "$9" assigned for user "$8"

FastPattern.description: 21, PointToPointTrafficAudit: vpn this session has open tunnel
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="vpn: this session has an open tunnel with IP [\d.]+, we need close it first"

FastFormatter.condition: .*\buser=(\S+).*,vpn: this session has an open tunnel with IP ([\d.]+), we need close it first
FastFormatter.format: vpn: this session has an open tunnel with IP "$9", we need close it first for user "$8"

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="vpn: tunnel terminated"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="vpn: unauthorized zone rejected"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="vpn: user has disconnected the tunnel"
\d+ [-\w.]+ AN_SQUID_LOG
\d+ [-\w.]+ Find route for 0x[a-f\d]+ with flag 0x[a-f\d]+, remove it

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) id=\w+ time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=([-\w.]+) pri=(\d+) msg="aaa \((\w+)\) :User \((\S+)\) error happen during auth, and no Rank to try" *$
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ msg="aaa \(\w+\) :User \(\S+\) error happen during auth, and no Rank to try"

FastField.defaultValue: User error during auth, and no Rank to try
User ($6) error happen during auth, and no Rank to try

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ msg="aaa \(\w+\) :User \S+ ERROR reason \w+ :[';\w ]+; user :\S+"
\d+ [-\w.]+ Flex License Error:\d+
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="TCP connection (?:close|setup|reset|start|timeout)"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="User logout, terminate TCP connection"

FastFormatter.format: fw: $3, pri: $4, site: $8, reason: "User logout", service: $9

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="UDP session (?:close|setup|reset|start|timeout)"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="User logout, terminate UDP session"

FastFormatter.format: fw: $3, pri: $4, site: $8, reason: "User logout", service: $9

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="AAA LDAP authentication (?:accept|reject)ed\."
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Found role\(s\) matching this login request: group \(.*\), login method \([-\w]+\), role \(.*\)\."
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Killed an expired session +[a-f\d]+ for user \S+ during.*"

FastFormatter.condition: Killed an expired session +([a-f\d]+) for user (\S+) during (.+)
FastFormatter.format: Killed an expired session "$8" for user "$9" during "$10"

FastFormatter.condition: Killed an expired session +([a-f\d]+) for user (\S+) during.*
FastFormatter.format: Killed an expired session "$8" for user "$9"

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Session (?:creation|deletion) succeeded\."
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="(?:Session has expired[-, ]+ session duration = [\w, ]+"|clientapp: session id \S+ expired\.")
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Session (?:idle|life)time [\w ]+ configured limits? *\([-\w=:, ]+\).*

FastFormatter.condition: Session's (\w+) is at or beyond configured limits.*
FastFormatter.format: Session's $8 is at or beyond configured limits

FastFormatter.condition: .*\bvpn=(\w+).*,Session's (?:idle|life)time is at or beyond configured limits \(([-\w=:, ]+)\)

FastPattern.description: 40, UserAuthAudit: {Session idletime reached limit; unauthenticated session has reached the configured limit}
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="(?:Session idletime has reached the configured limit \([-\w=:, ]+\)\."|Unauthenticated session has reached the configured timeout limit)
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="User authenticated"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="User \S+ logged out successfully, session duration =[\w, ]+"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="User \S+ logged out successfully, session id [A-F\d]+, duration [\w, ]+\."

FastFormatter.condition: .*\bvpn=(\w+).*,User \S+ logged out successfully, session id [A-F\d]+, duration (.+)

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Authentication successful"

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) id=\w+ time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=([-\w.]+) pri=(\d+) (.+) msg="Authentication \w+, group info:? \((.*)\), login method:? \(([-\w]+)\).*" *$
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Authentication (?:successful|succeeded), group info:? \(.*\), login method:? \([-\w]+\).*"

FastFormatter.format: fw: $3, pri: $4, vpn: $9, sport: $10, dport: $11, group: "$6"

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="(?:Authentication|AAA accounting) failed,? (?:- [()\w ]+"|(?:login method \(\),)? *reason \(.*\)\.")

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) id=\w+ time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=([-\w.]+) pri=(\d+) (.+) msg="Authentication failed, login method \((\w+)\), reason \((.+)\)\." *$
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Authentication failed, login method \(\w+\), reason \(.+\)\."
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="(?:Request does not have a valid session|The requested URL has an unsupported encoding)"

FastFormatter.condition: vpn=(\w+) proto=[-\w]+ src=[\d.]+ sport=\d+ arg=.+ result=(\d+) type=vpn
vpn=\w+ proto=([-\w]+) src=[\d.]+ sport=\d+ dstname=([-\w.]+) arg=(.+) op=[A-Z]+ type=vpn
vpn=\w+ proto=[-\w]+ src=[\d.]+ sport=\d+ arg=(.+) result=\d+ type=vpn

FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Log in failed by \S+"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Log in by \S+"
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Log out by \S+"

FastPattern.description: 52, ApplicationTrafficAudit: clientapp {closed, reset} the connecion to backend
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="clientapp: (?:closed the connection to backend|backend [-\w:.]+ (?:closed|reset) the connection)

FastPattern.description: 53, PointToPointTrafficAudit: vpn existing VPN tunnel terminated
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="VPN: An existing VPN tunnel has been terminated\.

FastPattern.description: 54, PointToPointTrafficAudit: vpn Virtual IP has been released
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="VPN: Virtual IP \([\d.]+\) has been released\."

FastFormatter.format: vpn: internal IP address "$9" released by user "$8"

FastPattern.description: 55, PointToPointTrafficAudit: vpn tunnel has been established successfully
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="VPN: A new VPN tunnel has been established successfully\."

FastPattern.description: 56, PointToPointTrafficAudit: vpn dynamic IP is assigned to user
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="VPN: A dynamic IP [\d.]+ is assigned to the user\."

FastPattern.description: 57, UserAuthAudit: {AAA accounting succeeded; AAA RADIUS challenge request}
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="(?:AAA accounting succeeded|AAA RADIUS challenge request timeout)\."

FastPattern.description: 58, PointToPointTrafficAudit: Idle timer of the session was reset
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="The idle timer of the session \S+ was reset by the user\."

FastPattern.description: 59, PointToPointTrafficAudit: The request has invalid header
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="The request has invalid header: [\w ]+\.?"

FastPattern.description: 60, PolicyModify: changing AAA user acccount password
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Changing AAA user account password \([\w ]+\) (?:succeeded\."|failed:)
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="Request denied by ACLs\."

FastPattern.description: 62, PointToPointTrafficAudit: {AAA sent challenge ro server succeeded; sending AAA challenge to client}
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="(?:AAA RADIUS sent challenge to server succeeded|Sending AAA RADIUS challenge to client)\."

FastPattern.description: 63, PointToPointTrafficAudit: The lifetime of the session was extended
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ .+ msg="The lifetime of the session \S+ was extended by \d+ seconds by the user
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d+ vpn= user=$
\d+ [-\w.]+ id=ArrayOS time="[-\d: ]+"[-()\w= ]*? fw=[-\w.]+ pri=\d user=[-\w. ]+ src=[-\w.]+ sport=\d+ dst=[-\w.]+ *$
